board_manager

Class PostManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • board_manager.PostManager

  • public class PostManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A program to manage posts a board with different contacts in Java.

    26-09-2020
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ruben Borrego Canovaca, Pedro Pablo Garcia Pozo
